author: serge
msg: Added better checking to not call a "Could not connect to host.." failure a permanent one.  Generally documented that part better and structured it so it was easier to add additional conditions.
Also patched to correct bug report 6926 which was that the remote delivery was not reporting a hostname specified in the servenames.  It now uses the first entry in the servernames.

author: serge
msg: Patched as per Giles Chanot's bug 6678 to address some weird SMTP 250 response order issues that appeared with some MacOS clients.

author: serge
msg: Patched as per Paul H's bug 5818 to prepare for a future version of Avalon.
